About Raginii Uplopwar

Master practitioner of East-West fusion healing with over 20 years of transforming lives through ancient wisdom and modern science

The Journey of Mastery

Raginii Uplopwar represents a rare fusion of ancient Eastern wisdom and modern Western therapeutic approaches. With over two decades of dedicated practice, she has developed a unique methodology that honors the depth of traditional Indian healing while embracing the precision of contemporary psychological and energetic sciences.

As an accomplished author of 6 published books and a sought-after spiritual guide, Raginii has transformed over 1000 lives through her integrated approach to healing, combining Vastu Shastra, Vedic principles, chakra balancing, and Ayurvedic wisdom with numerology, psychology, and energy healing techniques.

20+ Years Experience
6 Published Books
1000+ Transformations
